title: Sell Angel's Envy Cask Strength
metaTitle: Sell Angel's Envy Cask Strength | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Angel's Envy Cask Strength bourbon and rye. We buy all annual releases and limited editions. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy every vintage of Angel's Envy Cask Strength.
introParagraph: Angel's Envy Cask Strength is a highly anticipated annual release features port-finished bourbon at barrel proof. We purchase all vintages, as well as the limited Cask Strength Rye and special Cellar Collection releases. Sell your bottle in its original wooden box for a top-market offer.
whatWeBuy: Angel's Envy Cask Strength Bourbon (all years 2012-Present)
whatWeDoNotBuy: Standard Angel's Envy Port Finish (86.6 proof)
photoChecklist: Front label showing the year and 'Cask Strength'
conditionFactors: Original wooden box is essential for full value
pricingFactors: Vintage year (inaugural 2012 release is most valuable)

faqs.question: Which Angel's Envy Cask Strength is most valuable?
faqs.answer: The 2012 inaugural release is the most valuable. Earlier years generally command higher prices.

faqs.question: Do I need the wooden box?
faqs.answer: Yes, Angel's Envy Cask Strength comes in a heavy wooden box. It is significantly less valuable without it.

faqs.question: Do you buy the standard Angel's Envy?
faqs.answer: We generally do not buy the standard Angel's Envy found on most shelves. We focus on the limit Cask Strength and Cellar Collection releases.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Cask Strength Rye?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Cask Strength Rye is a limited release that we actively purchase.

faqs.question: What is the Cellar Collection?
faqs.answer: These are special limited finishes like Ice Cider or Tawny Port. We buy all releases in this series.

faqs.question: How do I ship the wooden box?
faqs.answer: Place the bottle inside the box if it fits securely, or wrap them separately. Ensure the heavy box doesn't crush other items in the package.
